title: "Researchers use machine learning to predict heart damage in COVID-19 victims"
excerpt: "Using machine learning, scientists are working to identify which COVID-19 patients are at risk of adverse cardiac events such as heart failure, sustained abnormal heartbeats, heart attacks, cardiogenic shock and death."
